item.description:
Oi, eu vou cantar em Berklee no segunda-feira, July 16 as 7pm, 1140 Boylston Street, Room 1W um programma de musica Brasilieros: Jobim, Baden Powell e Guinga. Mais informacoes: myspace.com/krisadamsjazz. Eu espero ver voces la!
Kris

Hey,

Kris will be performing on Monday July 16th at 7 PM at 1140 Boylston St. Rm 1W. It will be brazilian music ranging from Jobim, Baden Pawell and Guinga. Check out her account: myspace.com/krisadamsjazz. I hope you guys can make it.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Brazilian Music Performance at Berklee
